titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Joint Items, House Historic Buildings Revitalization Trust for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Joint Items, House Historic Buildings Revitalization Trust for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for the House Historic Buildings Revitalization Trust.
